short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a cool password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
this tool provides a password with:
- 8 o more characters
- a mix of letters, numbers, symbols
. it useful to remember because it similar to a frequently word
- every time generates a new passwords (even with the same word)
This tool don't send data to others or track something.
